thread.title: People own up to the tiny things that make them inexplicably angry (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: People own up to the tiny things that make them inexplicably angry (6 Photos)

author: Brian Boone
title: People own up to the tiny things that make them inexplicably angry (6 Photos)
text:
3 GIF 
When getting ice and I drop an ice cube. I don’t lose my shit or anything like that, but a darkness briefly falls on my heart when a piece of ice hits the floor. No idea why. continuousBaBa ____ 
When people spit their chewing gum out in the drinking fountain/water cooler and leave it there in the basin. Back2Bach ____ 
Being woken up just before my alarm is due to go off, specifically if it’s 5 minutes or less. I don’t know why but for some reason being robbed of those precious final 5 minutes makes me want to fucking stab the motherfuker who dared to wake me. 4 GIF 
When your conversation partner stands 2 inches to close. Just move back there 2 inches, buddy. Actually, make it 8, bro. tupungato ____ 
Speed limit is 70. Asshat in left lane is doing 65, no one in front of them for a loooong distance and everyone is passing them on the right. Tyrael ____ 
When the internet isn’t down but it’s slow enough that it takes a minute or two to load a page
